summary: This node allows you to interact with the Slack API to perform various operations such as sending messages, archiving channels, inviting users, and more.

parameters.name: oldVersionNotice
parameters.description: Notification about a new node version available.

parameters.name: authentication
parameters.description: Select the authentication method to use (Access Token or OAuth2).

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to interact with (e.g., Channel, File, Message).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the selected resource (e.g., Create, Get, Archive).
